nodes.text: Corwin Ballast was a human male who left his homeworld of Mordal and moved to Jakku after his wife Lynnta and his daughter were killed during a blaster fight between Imperial and Rebel forces. By 5 ABY, Ballast was working as a bartender in Ergel's Bar when Grand Admiral Rae Sloane came to Jakku seeking information about Gallius Rax.
Corwin Ballast first appeared in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
